content.en: Accident severity prediction: Researchers have been using algorithms to analyze data and predict the severity of road accidents. They have been using various machine learning techniques such as decision trees, neural networks, and Bayesian networks to understand the factors that contribute to accidents and injury risk. By using these algorithms, they hope to improve road safety and reduce the severity of accidents.
content.da: Forudsigelse af ulykkesalvorlighed: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at analysere data og forudsige alvorligheden af trafikulykker. De har anvendt forskellige maskinlæringsteknikker såsom beslutningstræer, neurale netværk og Bayesianske netværk for at forstå de faktorer, der bidrager til ulykker og skadesrisiko. Ved at bruge disse algoritmer håber de at forbedre trafiksikkerheden og reducere alvorligheden af ulykker.
